# Description

This it the final PR for supporting migration of Canvas from
asset-centric to data modeling.

It implements the migration command.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6f2dfa1c-5bd7-4685-9b1a-28c66a43da14)

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9572b866-7f24-448d-aa84-907a2db07d37)

### After

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a357faf8-4a45-4698-98df-0fe518c2ebf2)


## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] New command `cdf migrate canvas` that enables migration of
Canvas from asset-centric to data modeling.

## templates

No changes.
